column4: why after i upgraded ubuntu on my Virtual Machine , I cant get into the graphic interface?
It's possible you have to update your kernel drivers to suit the new kernel, if it's the kernel that you upgraded.
Im new to ubuntu, but how do you upgrade your drivers?
Was just giving you a hint - I'm actually not an ubuntu guru (I'm from Debian), so someone in this channelw ill have to give more specific advice.
